english.segment1: In my heart, in my heart, there's a fire burning. A passion deep within my soul. Not slowing down, not growing cold. An unquenchable flame that keeps burning brighter. A love that's blazing like the sun. For who You are and what You've done
english.segment2: And as the fire is raging on. So Your praise becomes my song
english.segment3: The whole earth. Is filled with Your glory, Lord. Angels and men adore. Creation longs for what's in store. (Mountains bow and oceans roar). May You be. Honored and glorified. Exalted and lifted high. Here at Your feet I lay my life
english.segment4: From the ends of the earth. To the heights of Heaven. Your glory, Lord, is far and wide. Through history You reign on high
english.segment5: From the depths of the sea. To the mountain's summit. Your power, Lord, it knows no bounds. A higher love cannot be found
english.segment6: So let the universe proclaim. Your great power and Your great name
